  • java.lang.Object

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • MagicalCreatures

        public MagicalCreatures​(java.lang.String pImagePathCreatures)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates the magical creatures and loads the encyclopedia.
        post: Array of creatures is initialized with the information from the encyclopedia.
        Parameters:
        pImagePathCreatures - Image path of the creatures' pictures. pImagePathCreatures != null && pImagePathCreatures != "".
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there was an error when loading the file. If there was an error when reading the format of the file.

    • Method Detail

      • getCurrentCreature

        public Creature getCurrentCreature​()
        Returns la creature actual of the encyclopedia.
        Returns:
        La creature actual of the encyclopedia.

      • getNext

        public Creature getNext​()
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the creature next to the current one.
        post: The current creature has been changed to the next creature.
        Returns:
        The nextCreature creature.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the last creature is the current creature in the encyclopedia.

      • getPrevious

        public Creature getPrevious​()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the creature previous to the current one.
        post: The current creature has been changed to the previous creature.
        Returns:
        The previous creature.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the first creature is the current creature in the encyclopedia.

      • getPoints

        public int getPoints​()
        Returns the player's points. This value is always 0.
        Returns:
        The player's points.

      • getRemainingMoves

        public int getRemainingMoves​()
        Returns the player's quantity of remaining moves. This value is always 10.
        Returns:
        The player's quantity of remaining moves

      • findCreature

        public Creature findCreature​(java.lang.String pName)
        Finds a new creature in the encyclopedia by the name given in the parameter.
        Parameters:
        pName - Name of the creature. pName != null && pName != "".
        Returns:
        Creature with the specified name. If not found return null.

      • load

        private void load​(java.lang.String pImagePath)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the file given by the parameter to process it.
        Parameters:
        pImagePath - File path of specified file. . pImagePath != null && pImagePath != "".
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is a problem when loading the file.

      • initializeCreatures

        private void initializeCreatures​()
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize the array of creatures from the configuration file.
        post: Encyclopedia of creatures has been initialized.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If there is an error when initializing the creatures.

      • getQuantityCreaturesRow

        public int getQuantityCreaturesRow​(int pRow)
        Returns the quantity of creatures in the specified row. This quantity is generated at random.
        Parameters:
        pRow - Row to be consulted.
        Returns:
        Quantity of creatures in the specified row.

      • getQuantityCreaturesColumn

        public int getQuantityCreaturesColumn​(int pColumn)
        Returns the quantity of creatures in the specified column. This quantity is generated at random.
        Parameters:
        pColumn - Column to be consulted.
        Returns:
        Quantity of creatures in the specified column.

      • calculatePointsInQuadrant

        public int calculatePointsInQuadrant​(int pQuadrant)
        Returns the total amount of points that can be obtained if every creature in the specified quadrant is found. This quantity is generated at random.
        Parameters:
        pQuadrant - Quadrant to be consulted. pQuadrant > 0 && pQuadrant < 4
        Returns:
        Points that can be obtained in a specific quadrant.

      • getHighestPointsCreature

        public Creature getHighestPointsCreature​()
        Returns the creature of light that has not yet been found with the highest points. Always returns dragon.
        Returns:
        Creature with the highest points.
